description: The Triath Raider, while not a bad ship per se, does lack tactical capabilities due to its somewhat weak weapon system. As such, its clearly the kind of design one would expect from PMC. Experts have no doubt about this; it is quite unlike the Golem and Moebius which couldnt have been designed by PMC alone. The Triath Raider is mainly used for patrolling undisputed territory but also used for scout and reconnaissance missions.
name: Triath Raider
